workerTable.title: Worker Declaration
workerTable.disclaimer: I declare that I have answered honestly, to the best of my convictions. I also declare that this document faithfully reflects the answers I have given. I understand that if I have misrepresented or misrepresented or withheld information relevant to the eligibility assessment, the licensing authority may refuse to issue me the medical certificate or withdraw any medical certificate issued, without excluding further legal action against me. I authorize the release of this data to the AME physician and, where necessary, to the medical specialists of the licensing authority. I understand that this data will become the property of the licensing authority, provided it is accessible by me or my doctor in accordance with national law.

ameTable.title: Part reserved for the AME doctor
